title: A Beacon of Light, Kedren's 50th Anniversary Gala
desc: Kedren Community Health Center presents and invites you to?A Beacon of Light, a gala in commemoration?of Kedren's 50th Anniversary on Friday, November 20, 2015 from 6:30 pm - midnight at The Queen Mary, Long Beach. The gala, attended and supported by Kedren's employees, community partners, and friends is also an event to help support Kedren's children services. Over the past 50 years, Kedren has grown to become one of?the largest direct service organizations for mental health services in South Los Angeles. Just recently, Kedren has made great strides to expand our mission to become a complete holistic and integrated service provider.? In 2014, Kedren added primary care services, centrally located on one campus, thereby promoting and increasing comprehensive wellness for families and children of South Los Angeles. As Kedren moves forward, Kedren Community Health Center will continue to implement and expand our "One Stop Shop for Care" services in South Los Angeles to address the mental health, medical, substance abuse, housing and employment needs. Be a part of Kedren's history by attending A Beacon of Light, Kedren's 50th Anniversary Gala Friday, November 20, 2015 from 6:30 pm - midnight with the purchase of a ticket. If you are unable to make the event consider becoming a sponsor. ? Tables may be purchased by making a donation at the value of a following teir by clicking  : ?
